class_notes:
This course is specifically designed for JM students, and as such, it differs from any Administrative Law courses offered for JD students. Administrative Law is the law about agencies.
JM  Students only.  Per ABA rules, JD and LLM students will receive credit for JM courses
course_description: This course is not available to those who have taken Administrative Law on campus.
sections: Class Nbr: 1054, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Volokh, Status: Open
